pr_title: SAK-42890 Site Info > Groups: Indicate which tools and items are lock…

timeline.bodyText:
can use diamond operator here and in few other places
ArrayList<>()
timeline.author: ern

replies.bodyText: Well, it's optional right? I like declaring the types but ok, I've changed them.
replies.author: mpellicer

timeline.bodyText:
super generic and vague name SakaiService, also given that this is in a tool this shouldn't be named a service as it's misleading!
maybe something like:
GroupManagerOperations
GroupManagerActions
timeline.author: ern

replies.bodyText: I don't agree with this, this is a "service that interacts with some Sakai services", SakaiService makes sense to me. I'm not going to change the name of the service and all the variables in this PR.
replies.author: mpellicer

timeline.bodyText: Use the AssignmentConstants in the pi that's the whole purpose so we don't recreate all these constants.
timeline.author: ern

timeline.bodyText: Use the AssignmentReferenceReckoner to load an assignment reference which you can easily get the assignment to load
timeline.author: ern

replies.bodyText: Thanks for that, implemented the change, now using the AssignmentReferenceReckoner.
replies.author: mpellicer
